aboutAlphathumContent1: Two years ago, the world order was very different from what it is today. There is no turning back from this significant transformation. Organizations understand that working from home has become the new standard. For this reason, many Fortune 500 businesses are building hybrid office spaces that are dependent on the location of their employees rather than having a single hub that all employees report to. Instead of a single, large building, you will see several offices of the same company dispersed throughout the nation and the city. Co-working spaces are the solution to this need. The signs of development are all too evident.
aboutAlphathumContent2: In India's top eight commercial real estate markets, there are well over 500,000 controlled seats in use. The managed seat inventory increased by 18% annually the year before, indicating that the operator community is becoming more confident. Upon examining the top ten operators based on seat inventory, it is evident that the pandemic's effects on the industry have led to increased market concentration. As of Q4-2021, the top-10 operators collectively hold a commanding two-thirds share of the seat inventory in the top-8 markets.
